pageContext.claim: “I just got a little news that was given to me as I was walking up. U.S. forces, in the last month, have killed the terrorists responsible for the attack in Syria that killed four Americans, the Paris theater attack in 2015, and the USS Cole bombing in 2000. We killed them all. We killed them all.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be mistaken about the ISIS fighters responsible for a January 2019 suicide bombing that killed four Americans. A day before Trump's remarks, the Syrian Democratic Forces said they had captured -- not killed -- suspects believed to be involved in the January bombing.
